question: Which of the following got RBI clearance to register and function as a non-banking finance company (NBFC) recently?
explanation: Telangana Industrial Health Clinic Limited (TIHCL), a State government initiative, has got RBI clearance to register and function as a non-banking finance company (NBFC). It will be the first State promoted and co-financing NBFC. It had won the SKOCH Platinum Award in September 2017 under the smart governance category in the MSME segment.
